value: opened the seventh seal there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.
I saw the seven angels who stand before God, and seven trumpets were given to them.
large amount of incense was given to him to offer up, with the prayers of all the saints, on the golden altar that is before the throne.
along with the prayers of the saints, ascended before God from the angel’s hand.
the angel took the censer, filled it with fire from the altar, and threw it on the earth, and there were crashes of thunder, roaring,
flashes of lightning, and an earthquake.
the seven trumpets prepared to blow them.
first angel blew his trumpet, and there was hail and fire mixed with blood, and it was thrown at the earth so that
a third of the earth was burned up, a third of the trees were burned up, and all the green grass was burned up.
the second angel blew his trumpet, and something like a great mountain of burning fire was thrown into the sea. A
third of the sea became blood,
and a third of the creatures
living in the sea died, and a third of the ships were completely destroyed.
the third angel blew his trumpet, and a huge star burning like a torch fell from the sky;
on a third of the rivers and on the springs of water.
the name of the star is
a third of the waters became wormwood,
and many people died from these waters because they were poisoned.

the fourth angel blew his trumpet, and a third of the sun was struck, and a third of the moon, and a third of the stars, so that a third of them were darkened. And there was no light for a third of the day
and for a third of the night likewise.
I looked, and I heard an
proclaiming with a loud voice, “Woe! Woe! Woe to those who live on the earth because of the remaining sounds of the trumpets of the three angels who are about to blow them!”
